GisILineString Class Reference

#include <ILineString.h>

Inherits GisICurveAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisILineString:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisILineString class is a LineString Geometry type. The shape of GisILineString is the set of positions defined by the contained collection, plus linear interpolation between consecutive points.

Definition at line 34 of file ILineString.h.

 Gets the position at the specified (zero-based) index, by values of its member data. This is in aid of higher performance for any implementation that does not internally use GisIDirectPosition objects for storage, or for an application seeking to avoid overhead of accessor methods.
